text: What proportion of the EU's budget does the UK contribute?
What percentage of the EU budget is spent on administration?
What proportion of UK exports (of goods and services) were with the EU in 2014?
What proportion of UK imports (of goods and services) were with the EU in 2014?
How many legislative acts (regulations, directives and decisions) did the EU adopt in 2015?
What proportion of jobseeker allowance recipients are EU nationals?
Roughly how many UK citizens claim unemployment benefits in other EU countries?
How many EU families, resident in the UK for four years or less, claimed tax credits in 2014?
How many children resident in other EU states receive child benefit payments from the UK?
How many EU students are there in UK universities?
What proportion of NHS staff are from within the EU?
What percentage of Premier League footballers are EU citizens from outside the UK?
In 2015, how many more immigrants to the UK were there than emigrants?
For how long will the "emergency brake" period negotiated by David Cameron be in place?
What percentage of Britons are sceptical about the EU? (ie either want to leave it or stay in a EU with reduced powers)
